lead_paragraph: Juventus midfielder Sami Khedira will be sidelined for two to three weeks after medical tests revealed a muscle tear in his right thigh, the Serie A club said on their website (www.juventus.it).

headline.print_headline: Juventus Midfielder Khedira Out for Two-Three Weeks
headline.main: Juventus Midfielder Khedira Out for Two-Three Weeks
